meanings.definition: A person or group that emblazons or adorns with prominent markings or symbols.
meanings.sent1: The emblazoners carefully painted the flag with bright colors.
meanings.sent2: The emblazoners added intricate designs to the shield.
meanings.sent3: The emblazoners mistakenly used the wrong paint color, creating a rainbow flag.
meanings.sent4: The emblazoners were like artists, turning plain objects into masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The emblazoners' work made the shield stand out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: The act of emblazoning or decorating with prominent markings or symbols.
meanings.sent1: The emblazoners of the shield took great care in their work.
meanings.sent2: The emblazoners of the banner used bold colors to make it eye-catching.
meanings.sent3: The emblazoners' job seemed easy until they had to draw a complex pattern.
meanings.sent4: The emblazoners' touch turned the plain shield into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The emblazoners' skill in decorating was unmatched.
